mn118:4.3: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, bhiyyoso mattaya viriyam arabhatha appattassa pattiya, anadhigatassa adhigamaya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaya.
mn118:5.2: “bhagava kira tattheva savatthiyam komudim catumasinim agamessati”ti.

mn118:8.1: “Apalapayam, bhikkhave, parisa; nippalapayam, bhikkhave, parisa; suddha sare patitthita.

mn118:8.4: Tatharupo ayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhusangho; tatharupa ayam, bhikkhave, parisa

mn118:8.6: Tatharupo ayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhusangho; tatharupa ayam, bhikkhave, parisa
mn118:8.8: Tatharupo ayam, bhikkhave, bhikkhusangho; tatharupa ayam, bhikkhave, parisa
mn118:8.9: yatharupam parisam alam yojanagananani dassanaya gantum putosenapi.
mn118:9.1: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe arahanto khinasava vusitavanto katakaraniya ohitabhara anuppattasadattha parikkhinabhavasamyojana sammadannavimutta—
mn118:9.2: evarupapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe.
mn118:10.1: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatika tattha parinibbayino anavattidhamma tasma loka—
mn118:10.2: evarupapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe.
mn118:11.1: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagamino sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karissanti—
mn118:11.2: evarupapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe.
mn118:12.1: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanna avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana—
mn118:12.2: evarupapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe.
mn118:13.1: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe catunnam satipatthananam bhavananuyogamanuyutta viharanti—
mn118:13.2: evarupapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe.

mn118:14.7: evarupapi, bhikkhave, santi bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe.
mn118:14.8: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe mettabhavananuyogamanuyutta viharanti …

mn118:14.15: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imasmim bhikkhusanghe anapanassatibhavananuyogamanuyutta viharanti.
mn118:15.1: Anapanassati, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa.
mn118:15.2: Anapanassati, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata cattaro satipatthane paripureti.
mn118:15.3: Cattaro satipatthana bhavita bahulikata satta bojjhange paripurenti.
mn118:15.4: Satta bojjhanga bhavita bahulikata vijjavimuttim paripurenti.
mn118:16.1: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, anapanassati katham bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa?
mn118:17.1: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
mn118:18.1: Digham va assasanto ‘digham assasami’ti pajanati, digham va passasanto ‘digham passasami’ti pajanati;
mn118:18.2: rassam va assasanto ‘rassam assasami’ti pajanati, rassam va passasanto ‘rassam passasami’ti pajanati;
mn118:18.4: ‘passambhayam kayasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam kayasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati.
mn118:19.4: ‘passambhayam cittasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam cittasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati.
mn118:20.2: ‘abhippamodayam cittam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘abhippamodayam cittam passasissami’ti sikkhati;
mn118:20.3: ‘samadaham cittam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘samadaham cittam passasissami’ti sikkhati;
mn118:20.4: ‘vimocayam cittam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘vimocayam cittam passasissami’ti sikkhati.
mn118:22.1: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, anapanassati evam bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa.
mn118:23.1: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, anapanassati katham bahulikata cattaro satipatthane paripureti?
mn118:24.1: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu digham va assasanto ‘digham assasami’ti pajanati, digham va passasanto ‘digham passasami’ti pajanati;
mn118:24.2: rassam va assasanto ‘rassam assasami’ti pajanati, rassam va passasanto ‘rassam passasami’ti pajanati;
mn118:24.4: ‘passambhayam kayasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam kayasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati;
mn118:24.5: kaye kayanupassi, bhikkhave, tasmim samaye bhikkhu viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
mn118:24.6: Kayesu kayannataraham, bhikkhave, evam vadami yadidam—assasapassasa.
mn118:24.7: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, kaye kayanupassi tasmim samaye bhikkhu viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
mn118:25.1: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘pitipatisamvedi assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘pitipatisamvedi passasissami’ti sikkhati;
mn118:25.4: ‘passambhayam cittasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam cittasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati;
mn118:25.5: vedanasu vedananupassi, bhikkhave, tasmim samaye bhikkhu viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
mn118:25.6: Vedanasu vedanannataraham, bhikkhave, evam vadami yadidam—assasapassasanam sadhukam manasikaram.
mn118:25.7: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, vedanasu vedananupassi tasmim samaye bhikkhu viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
mn118:26.1: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘cittapatisamvedi assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘cittapatisamvedi passasissami’ti sikkhati;
mn118:26.2: ‘abhippamodayam cittam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘abhippamodayam cittam passasissami’ti sikkhati;
mn118:26.3: ‘samadaham cittam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘samadaham cittam passasissami’ti sikkhati;
mn118:26.4: ‘vimocayam cittam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘vimocayam cittam passasissami’ti sikkhati;
mn118:26.5: citte cittanupassi, bhikkhave, tasmim samaye bhikkhu viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
mn118:26.6: Naham, bhikkhave, mutthassatissa asampajanassa anapanassatim vadami.
mn118:26.7: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, citte cittanupassi tasmim samaye bhikkhu viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
mn118:27.1: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘aniccanupassi assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘aniccanupassi passasissami’ti sikkhati;
mn118:27.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi, bhikkhave, tasmim samaye bhikkhu viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
mn118:27.6: So yam tam abhijjhadomanassanam pahanam tam pannaya disva sadhukam ajjhupekkhita hoti.
mn118:27.7: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, dhammesu dhammanupassi tasmim samaye bhikkhu viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
mn118:28.1: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, anapanassati evam bahulikata cattaro satipatthane paripureti.
mn118:29.1: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, cattaro satipatthana katham bahulikata satta bojjhange paripurenti?
mn118:30.1: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam, upatthitassa tasmim samaye sati hoti asammuttha.
mn118:30.2: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno upatthita sati hoti asammuttha, satisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti. Satisambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, satisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
mn118:31.1: So tathasato viharanto tam dhammam pannaya pavicinati pavicayati parivimamsam apajjati.
mn118:31.2: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathasato viharanto tam dhammam pannaya pavicinati pavicayati parivimamsam apajjati, dhammavicayasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, dhammavicayasambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, dhammavicayasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
mn118:32.1: Tassa tam dhammam pannaya pavicinato pavicayato parivimamsam apajjato araddham hoti viriyam asallinam.
mn118:32.2: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tam dhammam pannaya pavicinato pavicayato parivimamsam apajjato araddham hoti viriyam asallinam, viriyasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, viriyasambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, viriyasambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
mn118:33.2: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno araddhaviriyassa uppajjati piti niramisa, pitisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, pitisambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, pitisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
mn118:34.2: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pitimanassa kayopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati, passaddhisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, passaddhisambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, passaddhisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
mn118:35.2: Yasmim samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno passaddhakayassa sukhino cittam samadhiyati, samadhisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno araddho hoti, samadhisambojjhangam tasmim samaye bhikkhu bhaveti, samadhisambojjhango tasmim samaye bhikkhuno bhavanaparipurim gacchati.
mn118:36.1: So tathasamahitam cittam sadhukam ajjhupekkhita hoti.
